item.title: Golden Rod
item.description: Goldenrod - a variable perennial with a knotted rhizome and upright stems. Yellow flowers are born in the summer, followed by brown fruits with a tuft of short, white hairs. It is an antioxidant, diuretic, and astringent, goldenrod is a valuable remedy for urinary tract disorders and targets the kidneys and liver. The diuretic effect is very helpful for cases of colon bacilli. The saponins act specifically against the Candida fungus, the cause of yeast infections and oral thrush. During the reign of Queen Elizabeth, goldenrod powder was exported to London for its healing powers and was sold for as much as a half crown per pound. One superstition says that he who carries the plant will find treasure. Thus, the goldenrod is the symbol for good fortune. Goldenrod's Latin name is Solidago virgaurea. The word solidago means to strengthen or make whole, which is testimonial for why this herb is used so widely for good health. 30ml herbal tincture. Always read the label for directions on use. Shake well. Use 15 drops 3 times a day or as recommended by a health care professional. May be used in a glass of water or directly on the back of the tongue.

item.title: Red Clover
item.description: A herb most commonly found in light sandy meadows in Britain and throughout Europe and Asia. Red clover is an amazingly versatile plant that is frequently classified as a tonic in Western herbalism because it re-balances and strengthens so many organ systems. Traditional herbalists have employed red clover for centuries as both a nutritive and cleansing remedy because of its blood and lymph detoxifying properties. This has led to traditional, folk-herbalism applications for anemia, fatigue, arthritis, fevers, chronic inflammatory respiratory complaints and tumors. Folk herbalism suggests it also has secondary diuretic properties for chronic urinary inflammation, reduces swelling, promotes tissue healing, relieves dry skin, eyes and hair complaints as well as constipation due to dryness. Additionally, traditional herbalists use red clover to relax the nervous system, reduce muscle spasms and relieve mild pain. More information about Red Clover here: https://www.hannasherbshop.com/index.php/learn/article/red_clover. 90 herbal vegetarian capsules. Always read the label for directions on use. Take 1 capsules 3 times daily between meals. May be used in a glass of water or directly on the back of the tongue.

item.title: Rassoul Clay Mask
item.description: An age-old beautifying remedy, Rassoul historically means ‘substance that cleanses’. La Sultane de Saba Rassoul is deeply purifying. The Mineral Clay Mask removes impurities, promotes healthy skin and reduces oiliness, while balancing sebum levels. The Rassoul is a cleansing argyle from Morocco, it removes the skin impurities and leaves a delicate rose and geranium fragrance on the skin. The Rassoul is mineral rich which nourishes, tones and enriches skin. It is also ideal for oily hair by helping to regulate the sebum. Can be used on face, body and hair Rassoul is known as being far more absorbing and mineral rich than any other clays or mud's We mix with Shea butter and honey, rose and ginger mask for an all round vitamin and nutrient rich, luxurious body wrap with a calming rose fragrance. It’s powerful and absorbing so only 10-15minutes needed as a mask to see a difference. How to use: Used as a face mask, it brings a fresh glow. Also used on the hair as a shampoo or purifying hair mask, it reduce oiliness, cleanses the scalp whilst lifting hair from the roots, reviving lustre (so great for giving volume to fine or limp hair). Used as a body wrap, it cleanses, re-mineralises and nourishes skin deep down.

item.description: A natural astringent to refresh and tone the face and body. Especially good for combination skin. Can be kept in the fridge for a refreshing spritz to awaken a tired mind and weary body. Traditionally used by brides-to-be to give them a warm glow! Usage: Close eyes and simply spritz all over face, neck and upper body for a refreshing glow. For best results leave to dry naturally. La Sultane de Saba Face Toning Floral Water contains rose geranium and orange blossom. Use after cleansing as a toner before applying face oil or cream. Leaves the skin feeling fresh, clean and positively radiant. 100ml.

It is rich in beta carotene and full of vitamins which improves the complexion and skin tone whilst restoring the skins elasticity. This is ideal for those with sun exposed skin. This facial oil, rich in carotene, is also great for prolonging a tan (or add a healthy glow!)

item.title: Smooth Affair® Facial Primer & Brightener
item.description: After using Jane Iredale Smooth Affair Facial Primer & Brightener, skin feels nourished and looks smoother. Make-up goes on more easily and lasts longer. The light, fresh fragrance is uplifting and has anti-aging properties that evens skin tone, minimising the appearance of pores and increases luminosity. Smooth Affair Facial Primer & Brightener prepares the skin so makeup goes on more easily and lasts longer. It conditions the skin and prevents moisture loss. Usage: Use Smooth Affair as a primer before your make-up. Alternatively, wash your face at night for healthy, radiant, moisturised skin. With fingertips, spread evenly until primer has been absorbed. Use with or without your favourite moisturiser. Key ingredients: Grapefruit extract, Apple extract, Green and white tea leaf extract.

item.title: Glow Time® Full Coverage Mineral BB Cream SPF 25 UVB/UVA Broad Spectrum
item.description: This rich and velvety formula provides coverage to minimise fine lines and wrinkles, leaving skin bright and fresh. Contains broad-spectrum SPF 25 to keep skin protected and powerful antioxidants to calm and nourish. Glow Time can be used to cover blemishes, minimises pores, disguise wrinkles, smooth and brighten the skin. Up to 40 minutes of water resistance. Usage: Start with a few dots and apply with fingers to the face and neck. Blend with Blending Brush or Flocked Sponge. Key ingredients: Grapefruit extract, Apple extract and Bitter Orange Extract. Recommended for daily use by the Skin Cancer Foundation.

item.title: Beyond Matte® HD Matifiying Powder
item.description: Beyond Matte is unlike any matifying powder created before. Developed for professional make-up artists working in HD, it not only eliminates shine for hours - it also absorbs oil, lessens transference, makes skin look smoother, refines pores and increases the water resistancy of our minerals. Soothing Jojoba seed oil keeps skin touchably radiant as well as shine free. Four indispensable shades are available as well as refills in post consumer clam shells. The proprietary technology eliminates shine, lessons transference, refines pores and gives skin a flawless, smooth appearance. Ultra water resistant. First time buyers will be looking for a compact solution whereas others will benefit from the refill. Key ingredients: Acrylates Crosspolmer

item.title: Active Light® Under-eye Concealer
item.description: An eye conditioner and concealer containing moringa butter and avocado oil, both high in vitamin A, C, D and E. Unlike any other concealer you have ever used! It conceals by disturbing the way light interacts with the skin. Full of beneficial botanicals to calm tired eyes and nourish the delicate eye area. May even reduce puffiness. Contains green tea extract, a potent antioxidant. Usage: Use the camouflage brush if needed to smooth out any extra product and feather the edges with your finger. Key ingredients: Green tea leaf extract, Laminaria Ochroleuca extract and Algae.

item.title: Zap&Hide® Blemish Concealer
item.description: Both ends of our concealer stick have antiseptic and soothing botanicals that help end breakouts fast. Use clear Zap directly on the blemish or under foundation. Use Hide for complete, non-comedogenic coverage throughout the day. The blemish balm is a clear stick containing beneficial antiseptic botanicals, it is highly pigmented, easily layered and creamy. The double ended blemish treatment stick conceals whilst it aids healing. Usage: apply directly from the stick and feather the edges with your finger. Key ingredients: Psoralea Corylifolia Extract, Chamomile and Green tea leaf oil

item.title: Tantasia® Self Tanner & Bronzer
item.description: It's unique blend of ingredients work with the skin to gradually develop a customised, even, natual looking tan. Vegetable-sourced natural Silicone makes your skin feel like silk. The tinted formulation provides instant bronzing and optimal application control. The sensitivity tested formula makes it ideal for use on face and body. The delicate citrus scent is uplifting and has none of the unpleasant after-smell often associated with self tanners. Key ingredients:A combination of Acetyl Tyrosine and Monk's Pepper (vitex angus castus) stimulates melanin synthesis, leads to melanin formation independent of sun exposure, accelerates the melanin synthesis reaction, leads to regular, even and persistent tan; Copper Gluconate enzymatic bioactivator, increases more even color; Dihydroxyacetone (DHA) activates a beautifully natural-appearing, long-lasting color, compensates for the differences in skin areas and allows a smooth golden color.

item.title: Longest Lash Thickening and Lengthening Mascara
item.description: Fabulous colour, sea minerals that encourage lashes to grow to their fullest potential, and thousands of cellulose fibers to coat lashes for a look that's glamorous, rich and full - this state-of-the-art formula is a must have for any make-up bag. Designed to make lashes look thicker and longer naturally. Packaged in a squeezable tube with a high quality fiber brush that works with this formula to separate and define lashes, prevent clumping and create natural looking longer lashes. item.title: Just Kissed® Lip Plumper
item.description: Special peptides give moisture and visible plumping that lasts. One simple sweep and your lips will be transformed with sheer natural colour and a refreshing feeling you can't top! Tinted lip plumper with unique, time released peptides which increase hydration. Ginger root extract stimulates blood circulation, making lips appear fuller. Key ingredients: Beeswax, Shea butter and Palmitoyl Oligopeptide.

item.title: Just Kissed® Lip and Cheek Stain
item.description: A multi-purpose lip and cheek stain that uses all-natural ingredients to enhance your natural colour. The non-drying, long-lasting formula gives an irresistible shade. It's non-drying, long lasting, all natural multipurpose stain. Its colour adjusts to your own skins chemistry for an irresistible pink shade that will flatter any undertone. Formulated with ingredients that nourish and moisturise skin, smooth and soften lips. Key ingredients: Triisostearyl Citrate, Olive and Avocado Oils, Rose Flower Wax and Beeswax.

item.title: Just Kissed® Lip and Cheek Stain - Forever Pink
item.description: A multi-purpose lip and cheek stain that uses all-natural ingredients to enhance your natural colour. The non-drying, long-lasting formula gives an irresistible shade. item.title: Lip Fixation®, Lip Stain/Gloss
item.description: Now you can have it all - an ultra long lasting lip stain and a tasty gloss that gives you colour without feathering, luxe lips without drying, and coverage from sexy to subtle. Or lip stain formula goes on smooth and soft, is highly water resistant and locks in moisture. Smooth the complimentary shade of lip gloss over the stain for the extra moisture of avocado oil and a sweet vanilla finish. Stain gives long lasting, rich lip color without feathering. The delicious gloss highlights and accentuates the stain colour while conditioning the lips. Key ingredients: Lip gloss - Acrylates / Dimethicone Copolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate and Vitamin E. Lip Gloss - Avocado Oil, Jojoba Seed Oil and Ginger Root Extract.

item.title: Sugar&Butter Lip Exfoliator/Plumper
item.description: Soft, beautiful and oh-so-kissable lips are yours with our lip exfoliator / plumper duo. It gently removes dull, dry skin - then with shea butter and peptides, moisten and plump. Your lips will never feel so good. Made with organic brown sugar and Shea butter that exfoliates dry lips and moisturises thirsty lips. Key ingredients: Lip Exfoliater - Turbinado Sugar, Macadamia Seed Oil and Jojoba Seed Oil. Lip Plumper - Beeswax, Shea Butter and Palmitoyl Oligopeptide.

item.title: Lip Drink™ Lip Balm SPF 15 UVB/UVA Broad Spectrum
item.description: UVB /UVA medium protection with edible zinc oxide. Macadamia nut oil moisturises amd conditions. There is absolutely no petroleum derived ingredients. Add a delicious citrus flavour, and this is truly a drink for your lips. A colourless, moisturising, protective lip balm that combines a variety of waxes and oils to provide a protective shield. Recommended for daily use by the Skin Cancer Foundation. Key ingredients: Titanium Dioxide, Carrot Seed Oil and Avocado Oil.

item.title: Magic Mitt™
item.description: The perfect way to remove make-up without stripping your skin of its natural barrier. Quickly and completely removes make-up using only water. It promotes the health of the skin because it does not affect the acid mantle. When this beneficial barrier is intact, it aids the skin in protecting itself from harmful and invasive bacteria. Magic Mitt is made from a new generation of specially knitted micro-fibers which are able to penetrate oil films. Usage: Removes all make-up using warm water only - leaves skin squeaky clean. Washable and long lasting.

item.title: PurePressed® Base Mineral Foundation SPF 20 UVB/UVA Broad Spectrum
item.description:
You won't believe the difference our mineral bases will make in how your skin looks and feels. We've added algae extracts to help prevent moisture loss and protect against damage from UV radiation. Made from microized minerals which are water resistant up to 40 minutes. No oil, talc, FD&C dyes, synthetic preservatives or fragrance, so even if you have sensitive skin, you can relax. Contains antioxidants such as pine bark extract and Pomegranate extract (a potent antioxidant that aids in minimising UV damage). Key ingredients: Titanium Dioxide, Zinc Oxide, Boron Nitride. Recommended for daily use by the Skin Cancer Foundation. First time buyers will be looking for the compact form which contains all the necessary equipment to apply. After this, the refill will be sufficient. How to use: Apply with powder brush.

Neutral colours: Ivory, Radiant, Satin, Suntan, Riviera, Caramel, Coffee, Mink.

Warm Colours: Bisque, Warm Silk, Amber, Warm Sienna, Golden Glow, Latte, Fawn, Butternut, Maple.

Cool colours: Light Beige, Natural, Honey Bronze, Autumn, Teakwood, Chestnut, Terra.

item.title: Liquid Minerals™
item.description:
Revolutionary liquid minerals diminishes the appearance of lines and wrinkles, minimises pores and evens out skin tone. Beneficial ingredients actually enhance the health of your skin. Winner of DAYSPA's Editors Choice Award. State-of-the-art technology prevents active ingredients from degrading and allows actives to time release into the skin. These visible beads in the airless pump are actually liposomes encapsulating other liposomes. Key ingredients: Hyaluronic acid, Zinc Oxide, Coenzyme Q10. Usage: Apply with foundation brush or flocked sponge. Spritz brush first with POMMISST for a sheerer look. Brush ovet with PurePressed Base for a broad spectrum sun protection.

Neutral colours: Radiant, Satin, Suntan, Caramel.

Warm Colours: Bisque, Warm Silk, Amber, Warm Sienna, Golden Glow, Latte.

Cool colours: Light Beige, Natural, Honey Bronze, Autumn, Terra.

item.title: Starter Kit
item.description: Whether you're looking to share the gift of gorgeous skin or you're just getting to know Jane Iredale, this kit is a must have introduction to the magical, mineral difference of Jane Iredale. Elegantly packaged in a luxurious jewel box, the kit features six customised shades based on the Fitzpatrick skin classification scale, making it just right for every skin tone. Discover the difference with these Jane Iredale essentials for amazing skin, bundled in a chic travel-size cosmetic case with extra-large mirror. Each kit includes a sample size of Smooth Affair, Amazing Base, 2 Shades of PurePressed Base, POMMISST, a Mini Powder Brush and Cosmetic Bag

Elegantly packaged in a luxurious jewel box, the kit features six customised shades based on the Fitzpatrick skin classification scale, making it just right for every skin tone. Discover the difference with these Jane Iredale essentials for amazing skin, bundled in a chic travel-size cosmetic case with extra-large mirror. Each kit includes a sample size of Smooth Affair, Amazing Base, 2 Shades of PurePressed Base, POMMISST, a Mini Powder Brush and Cosmetic Bag

item.title: Just Kissed® Lip and Cheek Stain - Forever Red
item.description: A multi-purpose lip and cheek stain that uses all-natural ingredients to enhance your natural colour. The non-drying, long-lasting formula gives an irresistible shade. It's non-drying, long lasting, all natural multipurpose stain. Its colour adjusts to your own skins chemistry for an irresistible pink shade that will flatter any undertone. Formulated with ingredients that nourish and moisturise skin, smooth and soften lips. Key ingredients: Triisostearyl Citrate, Olive and Avocado Oils, Rose Flower Wax and Beeswax.

item.title: Circu Flow - Herbal Capsule - 100 Capsules
item.description: This is an old formula to help the heart function efficiently. It is one of our most popular products and it helps circulation, blood strength,energy and vein health. It works well with Liver Formula to improve the blood flow to the hands and feet. it has been formulated 30 years ago and has helped many customers who found their limbs moved better and their temperature circulation improved. three capsules three times per day is recommended before meals and taken with 2 teaspoons of aloe vera juice to be effective.

item.title: Taurin - Dophilus
item.description: Creates healthy intestinal flora and friendly bacteria. It helps heal leaky gut syndrome and is used to treat candida. It is also useful to take after a course of antibiotics.
